If you created this torrent for just a single recipient, why did you post it here for millions of people to see?
What is the point in that?
You could simply have emailed the .torrent file to your intended recipient instead.
Not a lot of people knows how to do that, including myself, mod...

Er det bare deg som ikke vet dette, eller er all di Norske s책 tjukke i huet?


If you had agreed to sell your bicycle privately to your neighbour, would you then go and take out a classified ad in a newspaper with a large circulation, advertising the same bicycle for sale?
